narrative:
This 1st pre-license inspection and exit briefing for a Class A license were conducted with the applicant.
No non-compliant items were identified during this inspection.
The applicant will submit a copy of this report along with the license fee and the Microchip Request form to the
Regional Office at:
USDA-APHIS-Animal Care
2150 Centre Avenue
Building B, 3W11
Fort Collins, CO  80526
REGULATED ACTIVITIES CAN NOT BE PERFORMED UNTIL A CERTIFICATE HAS BEEN ISSUED BY THE
REGIONAL OFFICE.
